pkgmetadata.longdescription: Function that Creates a Heat Map from Hybridization Data // Using hybrid data, this package created a vividly colored hybrid heat map. The input is two files which are auto-selected. The first file has three columns, the first two for pairs of species, with the third column for the hybrid experiment code (an integer). The second file is a list of code and their descriptions in two columns. The output is a figure showing the hybrid heat map with a color legend.
